content:
ok, all the ballot is posted. See

http://hl7.org/fhir/2018Jan HL7 Fast Healthcare Interoperability Resources (FHIR®) Specification, Release 1 (PI ID: 891) O4 Dec 22, 2017 Jan 22, 2018 No Return
(postponed) HL7 FHIR® Implementation Guide: Clinical Decision Support for Immunizations, Release 1 (PI ID: 1342) D1 Dec 22, 2017 Jan 22, 2018 No Return
http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/ecr HL7 FHIR® Implementation Guide: Electronic Case Reporting (eCR), Release 1 (PI ID: 1366) O1 Dec 22, 2017 Jan 22, 2018 No Return
http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/phd HL7 FHIR® Implementation Guide: Personal Health Device (PHD), Release 1 (PI ID: 1277) D1 Dec 22, 2017 Jan 22, 2018 No Return
http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/pocd HL7 FHIR® Implementation Guide: Point-of-care Device (PoCD), Release 1 (PI ID: 1277) I1 Dec 22, 2017 Jan 22, 2018 No Return
http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/vhdir HL7 FHIR® Implementation Guide: Validated Healthcare Directory, Release 1 (PI ID: 1345) O1 Dec 22, 2017 Jan 22, 2018 No Return
http://hl7.org/fhir/us/qicore HL7 FHIR® Profile: Quality, Release 1 - US Realm (PI ID: 1125) D3 Dec 22, 2017 Jan 22, 2018 No Return
http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core HL7 FHIR® Profile: US-Core, Release 1 STU Release 2 (PI ID: 1372)
@Michel Rutten @Bryn Rhodes @Eric Haas @Todd Cooper @Brian Postlethwaite please check, and then ask relevant co-chairs to confirm to @Lynn Laakso
Hi @Grahame Grieve, thank you very much! I've checked PoCD & PHD guides, looking good.

@Grahame Grieve

  • Just confirming the above links are to the history files or Current releases and not to the ballot version.
  • The ECR publication history link http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/vhdir/history.html is pointing to the VHD history
  • the ECR CI build link in the history file should be: http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/case-reporting/index.html
  • Thanks
QI-Core content (http://hl7.org/fhir/us/qicore/2018Jan/index.html) looks great, thank you @Grahame Grieve
@Eric Haas - should be all fixed now. thanks
@Grahame Grieve thanks, looks good...I am assuming we are ok to commit to the git repos again?
